widget.name: Getting To Work And Other Bullshit

description.p: Every day, you've got to get to work by walking up the sidewalk. Sure, it's some bullshit, not having a car and having to deal with rain, snow, orcs, and giant bees.... wait. Orcs? Giant bees? You're just trying to get to work here! (Incomplete/Testing)

widget.author: Phillip J Rhoades
